data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.expected_result: It should be darkened/highlighted only if hovered over like other users
data.short_description: First user in the list for adding people to group DMs is always darkened/highlighted even if the mouse isn't hovering over it
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends tab - Click the square with pencil icon at top right - Observe the first user in the list
